resolutions.title: [ARFC] Aave Treasury RWA Allocation
resolutions.author: Asad Khan
resolutions.excerpt: This proposal brings on Centrifuge as a service provider to the Aave DAO to setup a legal structure to support RWA investments, develop RWA specific management and governance processes, and allocate $1M of the Aave Treasury's stablecoin holdings to a liquid US T-Bill fund on Centrifuge, as a proof of concept investment.

resolutions.title: [ARFC] Aave Treasury Proposal for RWA Allocation Snapshot Vote
resolutions.author: Asad Khan
resolutions.excerpt: This is a first step towards a long term effort for Aave to develop and launch an RWA Facilitator that will back GHO with Real World Assets. With this proposal Aave can earn yield on idle stablecoins, establish long-term RWA infrastructure for the protocol, and allow the Aave DAO to begin building internal familiarity and expertise in the RWA industry.
